name: BerryDroid server
body:
### API documentation
####Pair cart
use this URL to pair a cart with user
```
GET request:
http://mcprojectserver.appspot.com/paircart?cartid=<cart ID : alphanumeric>&userid=<registration ID : String>&gcmid=<gcm ID ID : String>

Response:
{
    "status" : "OK"
}
```

####Get product information
use this URL to get location information about a product
```
GET request:
http://mcprojectserver.appspot.com/getproductinformation?cartid=<cart ID : alphanumeric>&productname=<product name : String>

Response :
{
    "shelf info": "3rd shelf", 
    "aisle": 4
}
```

####Add Product to the cart 
use this URL to add the product to the cart.  Send the cartId and productId to the server. 

```
GET request:
http://mcprojectserver.appspot.com/sendproduct?cartid=<cart ID: String>&productid=<product ID: String>

Response:
{
    "status" : "OK"
}

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
